values.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has pressed out into this rather feline shape, which is useful for eating, though they may hiss and meow more than talk.

[PAWN_nameDef]'s face has pressed out into this rather feline shape, which is useful for eating, though they may hiss and meow more than talk. Adaptation has removed some of the difficulty with speaking.
Triangular fuzzy ears grace [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. They coil back when [PAWN_pronoun] is getting ready to pounce.
A catlike tail. It flicks back and forth whenever [PAWN_nameDef] is displeased with something.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: feline eye
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: Slitted, yellow eyes are now [PAWN_nameDef]'s to keep. They are keener and rather enticing to look at.
